radiographic_examinations.findings: The lung bases demonstrate multiple pulmonary nodules measuring 6.6 mm, 6.2 mm, 8.4 mm, with additional smaller sub-2-mm nodules in the left lower lobe. The liver shows diffusely decreased attenuation suggesting hepatic steatosis. Evidence of diverticulosis with wall thickening and adjacent fat stranding in the sigmoid colon.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: New pulmonary nodules identified since prior study, and smaller sub-2-mm nodules in the left lower lobe were also new since prior study.
